VMware's virtual machines that you've been familiar with previously we have

availability you never want to have a host loss cause you to have a data loss
environment so VC on stripes your data across it and then uses the third host as a witness host to make sure that your
data is tolerant of a single host failure you can add a fourth fifth six up to sixteen hosts in a single cluster
that will remove them and you can pay for those three hosts on a three-year reserved instance and add a host for an
